assignments.label: Assignment 1
assignments.title: Data Science
assignments.reflection: In this assignment, I gained foundational knowledge in data science, including understanding the principles and importance of data in decision-making processes.

assignments.label: Assignment 2
assignments.title: Operators
assignments.reflection: This assignment helped me to deeply understand the use of operators in R, allowing me to effectively manipulate and analyze data using various operations.

activities.label: All About Me
activities.title: Introduction
activities.reflection: This activity was a great starting point to reflect on my personal journey and goals in data science, setting a foundation for future learning.

activities.label: Activity 1
activities.title: Leveraging Big Data and Data Science
activities.reflection: Through this activity, I explored the potential of big data and the role of data science in solving real-world problems. It enhanced my ability to understand data at scale.

activities.label: Activity 3
activities.title: Working with Vectors and Data Frames
activities.reflection: This activity introduced me to the fundamentals of handling data structures like vectors and data frames in R, which are essential for data manipulation.

activities.label: Activity 4
activities.title: Manipulating and Merging Data
activities.reflection: I learned key techniques for manipulating and merging datasets in R, enabling me to prepare data for analysis more efficiently.

activities.label: Activity 5
activities.title: Using Built-in Functions and Control Structures
activities.reflection: This activity helped me to understand the use of built-in functions and control structures in R, which are critical for writing efficient and reusable code.

activities.label: Activity 6
activities.title: Using APPLY Family FUNCTIONS
activities.reflection: Through this activity, I explored the APPLY family of functions in R, which streamlined repetitive tasks and improved my programming efficiency.
